title: Salon regards the alternatives
author: VD
content_html:
Freedom or global governance:

Ron Paul appeared on CNN’s “American Morning” on Friday, pushing the same apocalyptic message he served up during the Republican primaries, with one difference. His prediction of doom makes a heck of a lot more sense now than it did then.

“This system that we’ve had since 1971 is nonviable,” he said, “and it’s coming to an end.”

Hence the world political leadership is contemplating a new Bretton Woods under the aegis of British socialist and failed Prime Minister Gordon Brown. Financial crisis followed by massive left-wing government intervention… it seems to me that we’ve heard that song before.

Ron Paul was right.
